document.discussion_title: Alameda man chooses homelessness: ‘I just love sleeping outdoors’
document.topic_text: Photo: Tim Hussin, The Chronicle Sam Stone rides a bus to play mandolin at an open mic in Alameda on Wednesday, August 3, 2016. Stone has been homeless here on and off since 2007. Sam Stone rides a bus to play mandolin at an open mic in Alameda on... For many homeless in the Bay Area, living on the street has come after a series of hardships. But for Sam Stone, it’s partially a choice.
